name: you-are-not
description: Runtime type-checking written in TypeScript -- Not is a minimal, blazing fast, intuitive, API-centric, and customisable API payload sanitiser/type-checking/validation/error handing and messaging helper -- all in a small and neat pack.

scripts.coveralls: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.browserify:
browserify dist/node/index.js > dist/browser/not.js --standalone Not --global-transform [ babelify --configFile ./.dist.babelrc ] -p [ @jsdevtools/browserify-banner --template "<%= pkg.name %> v<%= pkg.version %>
(c) 2020-2021 <%= pkg.author %>
Release under <%= pkg.license %> license." ]
scripts.browserify:minify:
browserify dist/node/index.js > dist/browser/not.min.js --standalone Not --global-transform [ babelify --configFile ./.dist.babelrc ] -p tinyify -p [ @jsdevtools/browserify-banner --template "<%= pkg.name %> v<%= pkg.version %>
(c) 2020-2021 <%= pkg.author %>
Release under <%= pkg.license %> license." ]
scripts.build: npm run tsc & npm run browserify && npm run browserify:minify

author: calvintwr
